details.description: Chris Phethean is a postdoctoral research fellow at the University of Southampton’s Web and Internet Sciences research group, where he also gained his PhD in Web Science in 2015. His thesis examined the role social media technologies can play for charities, and where and how they create value for these organisations. Chris is now involved in research projects focused around data science, and carries out work to improve understanding of the demand for data jobs in the EU, as well as designing curricula and courses to address this demand. He teaches data visualisation on the Foundations of Data Science module and has been involved with the launch of Southampton’s new MSc in Data Science, along with significant involvement in the development of several online MOOC courses including one in Web Science and another in Digital Marketing.
